name: Zapped! (ZShapard)
description:
Zapped! allows you to play several arcade style games at once! Navigate the menus to select single-player or multiplayer modes for several games.

A game controller is required.

Sphera

Medium-intensity paddle ball game with several tricks. Gain power-ups and avoid other items that may prevent you from scoring. The objective of the game is to get the ball past your opponent into the goal. Each level is won and finished by defeating your opponent. 

Velocity-X

This high-intensity space shooter game has you hurtling through outer space avoiding asteroids. Shoot the asteroids to gain points and recharge your ship, which allows you to use a power-up to help you gain more points.

When you beat a high score, you can pick a nickname from a list and have your name added to the leaderboard.

This game is still in development and new games are in the process of being added. Feedback and criticisms are welcome.
